rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area with floor-to-ceiling windows providing natural light and a connection to the garden. The living room features an open layout to enhance the Brutalist aesthetic with raw concrete walls and minimalistic furnishings.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated home office space featuring floor-to-ceiling windows on one side for natural light and inspiration. The room is designed with a functional layout for workstations and storage, incorporating Vastu elements like proper alignment of entrances.

rooms.name: Kitchenette
rooms.description: A compact kitchenette integrated into the living area. Designed with Brutalist style using concrete finishes and steel accents. Incorporates energy-efficient appliances and follows Vastu guidelines for placement to ensure good health.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A minimalist bathroom with functional fixtures and raw finishes. Designed in accordance with Vastu principles to maintain privacy and energy flow.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: A robust concrete doorway with reinforced steel framing. Positioned on the east side to welcome positive energy as per Vastu principles.

openings.name: Garden Access
openings.description: An opening leading to a large garden area surrounding the property. The garden design enhances natural aesthetics and complies with local building norms for outdoor spaces.
